pct:challenge.pct:name: Activate Normal Waypoints
pct:challenge.pct:description: Activate the Waypoints in each of the following areas on Normal Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill these Act 2 Uniques
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill each of the following Unique bosses.

pct:info.pct:text: Found in the Crossroads in upper-right quarter

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill 50 Monsters Bearing Silver
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill 50 monsters that are carrying Silver Coins.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fulfill a Prophecy
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete any Prophecy.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Complete these Encounters I
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete each of the following Encounters.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Kill a Rare monster with a Nemesis mod.
Kill all members of a Bloodline pack.
Kill the boss of a Corrupted Vaal Side Area.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill these Normal Act Bosses
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill each of the following Unique bosses in Normal Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Create a Hideout
pct:challenge.pct:description: Create a Hideout of any size.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Clear Cruel Sewers
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear each of the following areas in Cruel or Merciless Difficulty. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain. Once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Complete These Cruel Quests
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete each of the following quests in Cruel Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Use these Currency Items
pct:challenge.pct:description: Use each of the following Currency Items at least once.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Complete these Encounters II
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete each of the following Encounters.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Fully Clear a Corrupted Vaal Side Area
Kill a monster Possessed by a Tormented Warlord

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill Cruel Act Bosses
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill each of the following Unique bosses in Cruel Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Clear Merciless Dried Lake
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear The Dried Lake in Merciless Difficulty. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain, once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fulfill a Prophecy Chain
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete each stage of a Prophecy Chain. You will lose your progress in a Chain if you Seal one of its Prophecies away.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill Merciless Rares
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill a Rare monster of each of these types in Merciless Difficulty.

pct:info.pct:text: Found in The Mines 1/2, The Crystal Veins

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fulfill these Prophecy Types I
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete a Prophecy of each of the following types.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Cleanse an area of Prophecized vermin
Complete a Prophecized Mission for a Master
Enter an area with a Prophecized Tempest
Kill a new Prophecized Unique boss
Take an item to 20% quality with a Prophecy

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill 25 Vaal Bosses
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill 25 Unique Vaal side area bosses in any Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Currency from Vendor Recipes
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete vendor recipes to receive each of the following items. A vendor recipe is when you trade a specific pattern of items to a vendor, not when you buy items from his/her purchase screen.

pct:info.pct:text: Map with 20% quality / Maps with 40% quality in total / Stone Hammer/Rock Breaker/Gavel with 20% quality + any map
Full equipment set of (unidentified) rare items with itemlevel between 60-74
Item with one socket of each colour (red, green, blue) linked together
2 Identified rare items with same name (can be obtained from strongbox which contain mirrored items)

pct:challenge.pct:name: Level a Gem to 20
pct:challenge.pct:description: Upgrade a Skill Gem or a Support Gem to level 20. You can trade it away afterwards.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Open a Unique strongbox
pct:challenge.pct:description: Open one of the following six Unique Strongboxes. Strongboxes do not need to be identified to complete the challenge. The ambushers must be defeated before it is counted as open.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fully Upgrade your Hideout
pct:challenge.pct:description: Create or Upgrade to a Large-sized Hideout. You need a lvl 7 master to do this.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill Merciless Izaro
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill Izaro in Merciless Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fulfill these Prophecy Types II
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete a Prophecy of each of the following types.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Clear an area of Prophecized Beyond monsters
Fulfil a Prophecy that modifies item sockets
Fulfill the first link in a Prophecy chain
Get Prophecized Currency from a Slain monster
Get a Prophecized Unique item from a Rare monster
Get a random Unique item from a Prophecy
Kill a group of Prophecized Exiles in a Map

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill these Beyond Demons
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill any five of the following six Unique bosses. You can encounter beyond demons by crafting the Otherworldly prefix on a map or use the Beyond Mod from Zana's map device.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Abaxoth, the End of All That Is

pct:challenge.pct:name: Identify 50 Unique Items
pct:challenge.pct:description: Identify any 50 Unique items. You can trade them away afterwards. Warning: Identifying multiple uniques within the same second may prevent them from being counted correctly.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Complete these Encounters III
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete each of the following Encounters.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Fully clear a map affected by a Tempest
Kill 1000 monsters in a single Rampage kill streak
Kill a Keepers of the Trove Bloodline pack
Kill a Rare monster with Inner Treasure
Kill a monster Possessed by two Tormented Spirits

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill these Merciless Act Bosses
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill each of the following Unique bosses in Merciless Difficulty.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Fulfill these Prophecy Chains
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fulfill 4 of the following 8 Prophecy Chains.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Reach Level 90
pct:challenge.pct:description: Attain character level 90. This challenge still counts even if your character dies afterwards.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Clear Unidentified Rare Maps
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear the following rare end-game Maps while they're unidentified. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain, once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Unseal the Endgame Labyrinth
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete all of the Map Ascendancy Trials to unlock the Endgame Labyrinth. People share findings of these trials in /global 820.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill these Map Bosses
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill each of the following Unique bosses.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Kill Argus in the Endgame Labyrinth
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill Argus in the Endgame Labyrinth.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Defeat the Pale Council
pct:challenge.pct:description: Open a portal to the Pale Court and defeat the Pale Council.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Redeem Divination Card Sets
pct:challenge.pct:description: Turn in sets of at least 7 of the following 12 Divination card types to Tasuni.

pct:info.pct:text: Drops in The Marketplace (N,C,M), Arcade Map, Bazaar Map
Drops in The Aqueduct (N,C,M), Channel Map, Waterways Map
Drops in Kaom's Dream/Path/Stronghold (N,C,M), Abyss Map, Volcano Map
Drops from Voll, Emperor of Purity (M) Boss of The Dried Lake, The Brittle Emperor (Boss of Wasteland Map)
Drops in The Slums (N,C,M), Ghetto Map, Precint Map
Drops in The Broken Bridge (C), Coves Map, Gorge Map
Drops in a lot of Tier 5+ Maps
Drops in The Crystal Veins, The Mines 1/2 (N,C,M), Excavation Map, Quarry Map

pct:challenge.pct:name: Clear Twinned Maps
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear maps in each of the following tiers while they have the Twinned mod. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain, once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Get Maps from Map Bosses
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete 300 Map boss encounters that result in at least one Map being dropped by the boss. Maps do not have to be allocated to you to count for this challenge.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Complete these Encounters IV
pct:challenge.pct:description: Complete each of the following encounters.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Kill all members of a Bloodline pack (200)

pct:challenge.pct:name: Clear Maps with Eight Mods
pct:challenge.pct:description: Fully clear maps in 10 of the following 15 tiers while they have 8 mods. You can create maps with 8 mods by using a vaal orb on a map. Use the /remaining command to see how many monsters remain, once you're getting close. Everyone in the area will receive credit for the clear.

pct:challenge.pct:name: Complete Two Endgame Grinds
pct:challenge.pct:description: Kill two of these four Unique bosses the following numbers of times.

pct:subchallenge.pct:name: Voll, Emperor of Purity in Merciless (1,200)
